short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make QR codes for any website or pdf

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Code Generator.

Description:
Easily generate and download QR codes from URLs directly in your browser with our QR Code Generator extension! Perfect for quickly creating QR codes for websites, this extension is designed to be simple, efficient, and always up-to-date with the latest standards.

Features:
Generate QR Codes Instantly: Capture the URL of the current tab and generate a QR code with a single click.
Download QR Codes: Save the generated QR code image to your device for easy sharing and printing.
Always Up-to-Date: Our extension fetches the latest QR code generation scripts from a secure server to ensure high-quality QR codes.

Security Measures:

Trusted Source: Remote code is fetched only from a secure and trusted server.
Encrypted Communication: All data exchanges with our server are protected with HTTPS encryption.
Regular Code Review: The fetched code is regularly reviewed and tested to prevent security vulnerabilities.


How to Use:
Click the QR Code Generator icon in your browser toolbar

Click "Generate QR Code" to create a QR code for the current tab's URL.
View the QR code in the popup window.

Click "Download QR Code" to save the QR code image to your device.

Click "Copy QR Code URL" to copy the URL of the QR code image for easy sharing.
